column1: 1594243897068343296,1594243897068343296@Korak855 @KoolKattLove @MarisaMarucci BS. Pelosi had no power to call out the National Guard. Even the actual authority onsite, the Capitol Police Board, could only *request* (if urgently) deployment of the Guard. Guess who could've called them in by order? Hint: It'd have to be some kind of \Commander in Chief.\" t_end"
